name: Spotify - spot on!
description: My version of Spotify focus on personal taste - Your taste. This style can really be as clean or complicated as you wish. I personally prefer the clean look out no. 2 - 7 (those with seamless patterns) - they are really sharp. But you might like anything else..... Feel free... See an example with latest version. Finally, here is a picture with four other examples how you could alter the design - click on the picture to enlarge (they are made with an older version, but you will grasp the possibilities). I hope you will enjoy it :)
